summary: SummaryM·A·Cximal Silky Matte Lipstick by MAC is an iconic creamy lipstick that has been maxed out to give lips MORE with a pigment-rich, full coverage colour and a silky-matte finish. Get more longwear with 12 hours of lasting colour, and 8 hours of moisture that leaves lips looking visibly fuller.
details: DetailsBenefitsConditions and nourishes lipsImmediate and 8-hour moistureComfortable formulaLong-wearing and color-true, 12 hoursNon-feathering and non-bleeding, 12 hoursNon-flaking and non-caking, 12 hoursIconic matte lipstick that changed the world we live in may have been reimagined, but each famous and fresh hue still serves up that signature vanilla scent you already loveKey IngredientsCoconut Oil, Organic Shea & Cocoa Butter: Helps to condition and and nourish lipsResearch Results98% said this lipstick feels comfortable throughout wear*95% said this lipstick provides high impact colour throughout wear96% said this lipstick leaves lips feeling soft/smooth**96% said this lipstick feels luxurious****Consumer testing on 120 women after using product for 1 week.**Consumer testing on 109 women after using product for 1 week.***Consumer testing on 110 women after using product for 1 week.Item 2635484How To UseAPPLICATION:Apply Lipstick directly to lips.Pro tip: Define lips with Lip Pencil or layer on Lipglass for a high-shine finish.Pro tip: Dab Lipstick on cheeks for a monochomatic pop of color.REMOVAL:Dispense one to two pumps of Hyper Real Fresh Canvas Cleansing Oil into the palm of your hand and gently massage onto lips.Emulsify with warm water, rinse thoroughly and pat dry.IngredientsOctyldodecanol, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Synthetic Wax, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Silica, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax\Candelilla Cera\Cire De Candelilla, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Kaolin, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba, Boron Nitride, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Methicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Lecithin, Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 28 (CI 45410), Red 30 (CI 73360), Red 33 (CI 17200), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: APPLICATION:Apply Lipstick directly to lips.Pro tip: Define lips with Lip Pencil or layer on Lipglass for a high-shine finish.Pro tip: Dab Lipstick on cheeks for a monochomatic pop of color.REMOVAL:Dispense one to two pumps of Hyper Real Fresh Canvas Cleansing Oil into the palm of your hand and gently massage onto lips.Emulsify with warm water, rinse thoroughly and pat dry.

reviews.headline: Mac lipstick is amazing (don't use it enough)
reviews.comments:
This Mac lipstick is a beautiful tint! 
However, when I line my lips with the brown pencil. The shade could turn pinkish— for my nude effect ! 

Wished it stayed the beautiful griese color like I have seen online. I'll keep trying !!!!!

reviews.headline: Very good
reviews.comments: Very good

reviews.headline: colors
reviews.comments: like the choice of colors. only brand that has purple.

reviews.headline: IgOGs!!
reviews.comments: The color is so rich and there is a scent of vanilla  or chocolate that smells so good.

reviews.headline: not my color
reviews.comments:
I prefer atte blue reds.  This looked like it would be a deep blue red, but it has too much yellow in it.
It turned orange on me and also seemed dried up.  
No, I did not like it at all.
Thank you

reviews.headline: Avant Garnet is THE red color
reviews.comments: I am OBSESSED with the shade of red avant garnet, it is the absolute perfect red lipstick I was looking for and I would highly recommend this color. I haven't worn the lipstick all day yet so we shall see, but so far 10/10 for me. Buy it!!!

reviews.headline: Long lasting lipstick
reviews.comments: Love these MACxima Lips they last a long time which is great cause I'm lazy when it comes to reapplying

reviews.headline: Doesn't last
reviews.comments: The sales person said this lipstick stays on. It does not. I would not buy again.

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: Love the color and it lasts for a long time

reviews.headline: Yes this is something I would re up on
reviews.comments: I like the darkness of the color

reviews.headline: I would buy the product again and again
reviews.comments: Have loved their lipstick for years. Never dissatisfied with the quality or texture.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Wonderfull!!! Lovet

reviews.headline: Beautiful nude
reviews.comments: I love this shade and I think it looks good on everyone.

reviews.headline: Great purple find!
reviews.comments: It is so hard to find a good purple lipstick… most of them are just too pink!  I want a shade that is more on the blue side, like a true violet.  Although this sliiiiiightly more pink than I would like (when I wipe it off, my lips are stained fuchsia), it is far better than other option that claim they are purple.  This was the best option I could find in-store.  Now, the formula… it's good quality, doesn't bleed; I like the matte formula better, it stays put longer.  Overall, I might buy this again, but I have since found a purple I like better.  I do in fact wear shades like purple and orange on a daily basis.

reviews.headline: Get the hint is a Hit!!!
reviews.comments: This is the only lipstick that I have tried so far, and it is very nice! There are very nice hints of pink that  will go nicely with my wardrobe!!

reviews.headline: So Sultry
reviews.comments: I haven't purchased Mac products in several years. When I saw this beautiful color on a young lady on TikTok, I decided to take a shot and not only try the color, but give the brand to try again. I was mine blown, not only by how beautiful. The color and the texture is, but how long it stayed on my lips.

reviews.headline: Didnt like
reviews.comments:
Didn't moisturize the way I had hoped 
Not glossy at all

reviews.headline: Changed ingredients..
reviews.comments: Will not purchase again. Ive worn MAC for years and this lipsticks they have changed ingredients which made my lips itch and sting….

reviews.headline: Classic
reviews.comments: Beautiful color

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love the color

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this product complimentary from BzzAgent and Mac Cosmetic for review purposes. I absolutely love MACximal's Silky Matte Lipstick in Twig Twist! The formula is incredibly smooth, providing a velvety texture on my lips. Twig Twist's color is versatile, complementing various looks. Plus, the long-lasting wear ensures I don't need constant touch-ups. Overall, a fantastic addition to my makeup collection! MACximal's Silky Matte Lipstick in Twig Twist has truly exceeded my expectations, making it a standout addition to my makeup arsenal. Let's start with the texture – the formula glides on effortlessly, creating a luxuriously smooth feel on my lips. It's not just matte; it's silky matte, offering a perfect balance between a velvety finish and a comfortable wear. The color Twig Twist is nothing short of perfection. It's a versatile shade that effortlessly transitions from day to night, adding a touch of sophistication to any look. The subtle twist in the hue makes it unique, catching the light in a way that draws attention without being too bold. One of the standout features for me is the lasting power of this lipstick. I can confidently apply it in the morning, and it stays vibrant throughout the day, minimizing the need for constant touch-ups. The staying power is especially impressive given the matte finish, which often has a reputation for being drying – not the case with Twig Twist. My lips feel hydrated and comfortable, even after hours of wear. The sleek packaging is another plus, embodying the chic and modern aesthetic that MAC Cosmetics is known for. The lipstick tube is not only visually appealing but also practical, making it easy to toss into my purse for on-the-go touch-ups. It checks all the boxes for what I look for in a lipstick. I wholeheartedly recommend Twig Twist to anyone seeking a high-quality matte lipstick that delivers both style and substance
faceoff_positive.headline: A must-have for a beauty enthusiast

faceoff_negative.comments: I can really tell that the team put attention to the lovely smell of this product. It was an almost cocoa butter meets Hershey's White chocolate. Both me and my collaborators loved the scent but that is where our awe dwindled. The packaging, while trying to be nostalgic, had several mismatching fonts that had no cohesive theme that left the unintended impression of an identity crisis. The bullet or cigar shape of the lipstick was fine until my male contemporary said it looked similar to something that might be used for bedroom activities; which was an offset to me personally, but might be a selling point to a different demographic. I loved the detail of the MAC emblem on the lipstick as well as the ease of use. The color, while vibrant, was easily removable but blended beautifully as a cheek rouge. Overall, it's an ok lipstick. Nothing ground breaking and not what I was expecting from such a reputable brand. In comparison to the Charlotte Tilbury MATTE REVOLUTION PILLOW TALK LIPSTICK, this just seems like cheap imitation.
faceoff_negative.headline: Review of MACximal soft matte in WARM TEDDY
